member.name: M:PlusStudioLevelLoader.LevelImporter.CreateRoomAsset(PlusStudioLevelFormat.BaldiRoomAsset,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an ExtendedRoomAsset from the specified BaldiRoomAsset.
member.param: The BaldiRoomAsset to construct the ExtendedRoomAsset from
If true, padding will be added in the form of secret and blocked cells, commonly used for non-square special rooms.

member.name: M:PlusStudioLevelLoader.LevelImporter.CreateVanillaRoomAsset(PlusStudioLevelFormat.BaldiRoomAsset,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an RoomAsset from the specified BaldiRoomAsset.
member.param: The BaldiRoomAsset to construct the RoomAsset from
If true, padding will be added in the form of secret and blocked cells, commonly used for non-square special rooms.

member.name: M:PlusStudioLevelLoader.LevelImporter.CreateSceneObject(PlusStudioLevelFormat.BaldiLevel)
member.summary: Creates a SceneObject from the specified BaldiLevel. The manager has to be assigned manually, and it is advised to rename the created objects from their auto generated names.

member.name: M:PlusStudioLevelLoader.LevelImporter.LoadLevelAsset(PlusStudioLevelFormat.BaldiLevel)
member.summary: Create a LevelAsset from the specified BaldiLevel.

member.name: M:PlusStudioLevelLoader.WeirdTechExtensions.ConvertToIntNoRecast(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts the underlying bits that represent the float into an int. Note that the "int" returned by this method is nonsense until converted bakc into a float. For example, passing in 10f will give you an int with the value of "1092616192" This method is used to store floats in fields that typically only support ints.

member.name: M:PlusStudioLevelLoader.WeirdTechExtensions.ConvertToFloatNoRecast(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the underlying bits that represent the int into a float. Note that the "float" returned by this method is nonsense until converted back into a int. Use this to convert "ints" made by ConvertToIntNoRecast back into floats.
